meanings.definition: Somebodies: persons of importance or influence
meanings.sent1: In the meeting, the somebodies made all the decisions.
meanings.sent2: The somebodies in the company always get special treatment.
meanings.sent3: The somebodies at the party were the center of attention.
meanings.sent4: She felt like one of the somebodies after winning the award.
meanings.sent5: The somebodies in the community were respected by everyone.

meanings.definition: Somebodies: individuals of note or significance
meanings.sent1: The somebodies in the history books changed the world.
meanings.sent2: At the event, the somebodies mingled with the guests.
meanings.sent3: The somebodies on the team always scored the most points.
meanings.sent4: She aspired to be one of the somebodies in the art world.
meanings.sent5: The somebodies in the class were admired by their peers.
